abilities.name: Nightmare Frost
abilities.effect: Applies slow for 2 seconds
abilities.description: Channels demonic frost to slow and damage enemies

abilities.name: Crystal Prison
abilities.effect: Stuns target for 1.5 seconds
abilities.description: Traps enemy in crystalline ice, preventing movement

abilities.name: Abyssal Tide
abilities.effect: Heals self for 15 HP
abilities.description: Summons dark waters that damage foes and restore vitality

abilities.name: Nightmare Hunt
abilities.effect: Next 2 abilities have 50% reduced cooldown
abilities.description: Enters a hunting frenzy, unleashing rapid attacks

abilities.name: Flame Slash
abilities.effect: Burns for 5 damage over 3 seconds
abilities.description: Quick fiery strike that leaves burning wounds

abilities.name: Demonic Roar
abilities.effect: Reduces enemy damage by 30% for 4 seconds
abilities.description: Terrifying howl that weakens enemy resolve

abilities.name: Infernal Execution
abilities.effect: Damage increases by 50% if enemy below 40% HP
abilities.description: Devastating finisher attack against wounded foes

abilities.name: Rose of Destruction
abilities.effect: Creates fire field that deals 10 damage/second for 5 seconds
abilities.description: Blooms a deadly rose of fire that burns the battlefield

abilities.name: Stone Shard
abilities.effect: Reduces enemy movement speed by 20%
abilities.description: Hurls sharp stone fragments at enemies

abilities.name: Molten Boulder
abilities.effect: Chance to knock down for 1 second
abilities.description: Launches a massive burning rock projectile

abilities.name: Bone Armor
abilities.effect: Reduces all damage by 50% for 6 seconds
abilities.description: Summons protective bone plating from the earth

abilities.name: Ancient Eruption
abilities.effect: Creates 3 lava pools that deal 8 damage/second
abilities.description: Calls forth an ancient volcanic eruption

abilities.name: Spore Burst
abilities.effect: 30% chance to poison for 8 damage over 4 seconds
abilities.description: Releases toxic spores from mushroom cap

abilities.name: Mycelium Network
abilities.effect: Spreads to nearby enemies, damage increases per target hit
abilities.description: Underground fungal network damages connected foes

abilities.name: Soul Absorb
abilities.effect: Heals for 100% of damage dealt and gains 20% damage boost
abilities.description: Mushroom feeds on enemy soul energy to grow stronger

abilities.name: Fungal Nightmare
abilities.effect: Causes hallucinations, enemy attacks random targets for 6 seconds
abilities.description: Psychedelic spores invade enemy mind, causing chaos

abilities.name: Savage Splash
abilities.effect: Heals self for 8 HP
abilities.description: Bestial attack that splashes healing waters

abilities.name: Dimensional Bite
abilities.effect: Teleports behind enemy, ignores armor
abilities.description: Phases through dimensions to deliver a devastating bite

abilities.name: Terror Howl
abilities.effect: Fears enemy, reversing their controls for 3 seconds
abilities.description: Horrifying roar that disorients and terrifies

abilities.name: Void Tsunami
abilities.effect: Creates void zones that deal 12 damage/second
abilities.description: Summons dimensional water that tears reality apart

abilities.name: Mind Lash
abilities.effect: Reduces enemy accuracy by 25% for 4 seconds
abilities.description: Psychic attack that disrupts enemy focus

abilities.name: Bestial Surge
abilities.effect: Gains 20% attack speed for 5 seconds
abilities.description: Channels primal instincts for rapid strikes

abilities.name: Abyssal Drain
abilities.effect: Steals 20 HP from enemy
abilities.description: Drains life force through demonic waters

abilities.name: Mind Break
abilities.effect: Enemy abilities have double cooldown for 8 seconds
abilities.description: Shatters enemy psyche, disrupting their abilities

abilities.name: Void Wind
abilities.effect: Pierces through defenses
abilities.description: Wind infused with void energy that bypasses armor

abilities.name: Divine Punishment
abilities.effect: Extra damage vs demon enemies
abilities.description: Holy power that especially harms demonic foes

abilities.name: Stellar Dash
abilities.effect: Becomes invulnerable during cast
abilities.description: Dashes at light speed, avoiding all attacks

abilities.name: Paradox Storm
abilities.effect: Deals divine damage to demons, demon damage to divine
abilities.description: Creates a storm of contradictory energies

abilities.name: Flame Burst
abilities.effect: Burns for 4 damage over 4 seconds
abilities.description: Pure fire blast that ignites the target

abilities.name: Molten Claw
abilities.effect: Melts enemy armor, reducing defense by 40%
abilities.description: Bestial claws superheated to melting point

abilities.name: Dawn's Embrace
abilities.effect: Heals 50 HP over 5 seconds
abilities.description: Channels the healing power of dawn's first light

abilities.name: Solar Apocalypse
abilities.effect: Burns all enemies for 8 damage/second for 5 seconds
abilities.description: Brings forth the fury of a dying star

abilities.name: Holy Bolt
abilities.effect: Heals self for 5 HP
abilities.description: Divine energy that harms foes and heals the righteous

abilities.name: Wind of Judgment
abilities.effect: Removes all enemy buffs
abilities.description: Divine wind that strips away false enhancements

abilities.name: Nature's Sanctuary
abilities.effect: Reduces damage by 75% for 3 seconds
abilities.description: Creates a sacred grove of protection

abilities.name: Final Judgment
abilities.effect: Damage increases based on enemy's missing HP
abilities.description: Divine wrath that grows stronger against the wounded

abilities.name: Frost Bite
abilities.effect: Slows enemy movement and attack speed by 30%
abilities.description: Chilling bite that numbs and slows the target

abilities.name: Silent Strike
abilities.effect: Cannot be dodged or blocked
abilities.description: Moves like the wind to deliver an unavoidable strike

abilities.name: Predator's Focus
abilities.effect: Next ability deals triple damage
abilities.description: Focuses hunting instincts for a devastating attack

abilities.name: Absolute Zero
abilities.effect: Freezes enemy solid for 3 seconds
abilities.description: Brings the temperature to absolute zero, freezing everything

abilities.name: Starlight
abilities.effect: Restores 6 HP
abilities.description: Gentle starlight that heals while harming enemies

abilities.name: Cosmic Winds
abilities.effect: Increases ability speed by 50%
abilities.description: Rides stellar winds for enhanced agility

abilities.name: Life Web
abilities.effect: Connects to enemy, sharing all damage taken
abilities.description: Creates a mystical bond that shares pain

abilities.name: Galaxy Dance
abilities.effect: Hits 5 times over 3 seconds, each hit stronger
abilities.description: Dances through space-time, striking multiple times

abilities.name: Steel Strike
abilities.effect: Ignores 50% of enemy armor
abilities.description: Molten metal strike that pierces defenses

abilities.name: Forge Strike
abilities.effect: Stuns for 2 seconds
abilities.description: Massive double blow that leaves enemies dazed

abilities.name: Demon Steel
abilities.effect: Gains 30 armor and reflects 25% damage for 8 seconds
abilities.description: Skin becomes like demonic steel, reflecting attacks

abilities.name: Molten Titan
abilities.effect: Becomes giant for 10 seconds, +50% damage and HP
abilities.description: Transforms into a colossal burning titan

abilities.name: Chaos Shard
abilities.effect: Random elemental effect each cast
abilities.description: Crystalline projectile with unpredictable properties

abilities.name: Divine Corruption
abilities.effect: Heals enemy but applies strong poison
abilities.description: Twisted blessing that heals before destroying

abilities.name: Geometric Prison
abilities.effect: Traps enemy in crystal cage for 4 seconds
abilities.description: Creates an inescapable geometric prison

abilities.name: Chaos Singularity
abilities.effect: Randomly applies all status effects
abilities.description: Creates a point of pure chaos that affects everything

abilities.name: Petal Stream
abilities.effect: Heals 10 HP
abilities.description: Gentle stream of water and sakura petals

abilities.name: Dream Shield
abilities.effect: Absorbs next 60 damage, then heals for absorbed amount
abilities.description: Creates a shield that converts damage to healing

abilities.name: Nature's Embrace
abilities.effect: Roots enemy and heals self over time
abilities.description: Vines embrace and hold the enemy while healing

abilities.name: Sakura Storm
abilities.effect: Heals 60 HP and cleanses all debuffs
abilities.description: Divine sakura petals that heal and purify

abilities.name: Thorn Whip
abilities.effect: Pulls enemy closer
abilities.description: Thorny vine that lashes and drags enemies

abilities.name: Wind Seed
abilities.effect: Plants grow over 5 seconds, dealing damage each second
abilities.description: Seeds carried by wind that grow into damaging plants

abilities.name: Feral Instinct
abilities.effect: Next 3 abilities have 50% reduced cooldown
abilities.description: Awakens primal instincts for rapid ability use

abilities.name: Midnight Bloom
abilities.effect: Creates area of darkness, +50% damage in darkness for 8 seconds
abilities.description: Garden blooms in eternal night, empowering attacks

abilities.name: Soul Flame
abilities.effect: Burns for 6 damage over 3 seconds
abilities.description: Dark fire that burns the soul itself

abilities.name: Butterfly Swarm
abilities.effect: Each butterfly hit increases next ability damage by 10%
abilities.description: Summons demonic butterflies that enhance power

abilities.name: Reaper's Wind
abilities.effect: Damage increases based on enemy's current HP
abilities.description: Wind that grows stronger against healthy enemies

abilities.name: Soul Harvest

abilities.description: Reaps weakened souls with devastating power
